ai-ja161:1.2_0: The noble ones understand the goal of the noble ones.
ai-ja161:1.3_0: Eventually he does what is wicked,
ai-ja161:1.4_0: Like the elephant to the one of Indasamāna’s clan.
ai-ja161:2.1_0: But he of whom you know: He is like I,
ai-ja161:2.3_0: With him one should certainly be friendly,
ai-ja161:2.4_0: for it’s a blessing to consort with good people.”
